channel.title: bad practice on Cloud Posse Developer Hub
channel.description: Recent content in bad practice on Cloud Posse Developer Hub

item.title: ClickOps
item.description: ClickOps is the error-prone and time-consuming process of having people click-through various menu options in cloud providersâ€™ websites, to select and configure the correct automated computing infrastructure. This is typically coupled with WikiOps processes and is considered bad practice in the modern cloud era.

item.title: WikiOps
item.description: WikiOps is the pattern of following Wiki-style documentation as the means of building and operating your infrastructure. This is to be avoided as it relies on ClickOps and documentation that becomes quickly outdated and inconsistent.
